pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Hang2 kong1 Yun4 shu1 Xie2 hui4
Guo2 ji4 Hang2 kong1 Yun4 shu1 Xie2 hui4

sentences.english: Airlift tipped the balance of the sieges .
sentences.chinese: 空运扭转了围攻战的战局。

sentences.english: They flew food and medicine to the flood-stricken area.
sentences.chinese: 他们向受洪灾的地区空运食物和药品。

sentences.english: Hong Kong Air Cargo Terminals Limited is one of the leading air cargo terminal operators in the world.
sentences.chinese: 香港空运货站是世界领先的航空货运站之一。

sentences.english: Horses must be crated in suitable containers for humane transportation and in accordance with IATA standard if transported by air.
sentences.chinese: 如用空运，则必须合符国际航空运输协会的标准。

sentences.english: Horses must be crated in suitable containers for humane transportation and in accordance with IATA standard if transported by air.
sentences.chinese: 如用空运，则必须合符国际航空运输协会的标准。

sentences.english: Most fruit is sent overseas by airfreight in order to save time.
sentences.chinese: 大部分运送到海外的水果都是用空运以节省时间。

sentences.english: It is very costly to deliver medicine to Tibet by air.
sentences.chinese: 空运药材进藏，成本很高。

sentences.english: Many large companies have specialized air and the Department of hangars .
sentences.chinese: 不少大公司都有专门的空运部和飞机库。

sentences.english: All of the items were freighted by air.
An air transport document must indicate that the goods have been accepted for carriage.
sentences.chinese: 空运单据必须表明货物已收妥待运。

sentences.english: I will try to use air frieght, with which it takes only 1 week.
sentences.chinese: 我将想办法使用空运运输，这样只需要一个周的时间。

sentences.english: We are specialized in fast delivery into the public warehouses inside Ocean and Air Terminals.
sentences.chinese: 特别提供最快捷的海运及空运公仓交货服务。

sentences.english: I suppose the main advantage of airfreight is speed.
sentences.chinese: 我想空运的主要优点是快。

sentences.english: Each air waybill has three originals and at least 6 copies.
sentences.chinese: 每份空运运单有三份正本以及至少六份副本。

sentences.english: He was airlifted to hospital and has now been taken off the critical list.
sentences.chinese: 被袭男孩被空运到医院，现在已经脱离危险期。

sentences.english: We want the stores to be air-mailed to our next port of call.
sentences.chinese: 我们想把这些物料空运到下一个停靠港。

definition: to put together an order and deliver it (i.e. 配貨|配货[pei4 huo4] and 送貨|送货[song4 huo4])/to deliver (goods)
land route/to go by surface transport
to procure (for an enterprise etc)/to purchase
